inclusion.criterion: Sacrocolpopexy with or without concomitant procedures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients having the first start surgery of the day to standardize hospital time.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Intra-operative cystotomy or urinary tract injury
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and history of recurrent UTIs, but no evidence of urethral strictures. Urologist not concerned with leaking around cath site.
